TopicTitle: MK 2 fuel tank adapters max temp is inconsistent with other MK2 parts

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: win 11 | CPU: I7 | GPU: RTX 3080 | RAM: 32

 

MK 2 fuel tanks and other MK 2 parts temp limit is 1500k

But all MK 2 adapters are 1000k, bicoupler and 1,25to mk 2. I see this as an bug because obiviously MK 2 should have temperature resistances.

Edited January 4 by The Space Peacock
